Package net.tangly.ui.components

package net.tangly.ui.components
The application can be used by mvn install (once) mvn (to run the application) The package provides a CRUD component for entities. Entities can have
  • A list displaying a list of entities with selected fields.
  • A tabbed details view showing simple fields view, comments view, tags view. The comments and tags view display again a list of values.
  • All custom components are extended to support setting a null value. The syntax is set a new value or clear the content.

The composite field abstractions cover two scenarios. Composite fields for immutable entities cannot use a binder. We provide a validator method to return validation logic for all internal fields. Regular beans providing at least getters for fields can be connected with a binder. Here we provide a binding method to connect the bean fields with converters and validators declared in the binder.

Care was taken to support cascading read-only and editing modes for all details views.

  • Class
    Description
    AddressField
    A composite field to update an address immutable entity.
    BankConnectionField
    A composite field to update an immutable bonk connection entity.
    CodeField<T extends net.tangly.core.codes.Code>
    Selection field for a reference code and all its values.
    CommentsView
    The comments view is a Crud view with all the comments defined for an object implementing the HasComments.
    Crud<T>
    The CRUD provides a grid view to a set of entities and views to view, update, create and delete an entity.
    Crud.Mode
    Define the different edition modes of the CRUD component.
    CrudActionsListener<T>
    The listener to react on CRUD component action completions.
    CrudForm<T>
     
    CrudForm.Operation
    Define the operation the form can process.
    EntitiesView<T>
    Defines a generic view for entities.
    EntityField<T extends net.tangly.core.NamedEntity>
    Provides a composite field for the properties of an entity object or a subclass of an entity abstraction.
    GridActionsListener<T>
    Provides default actions for the grid view.
    GridButtons<T>
     
    HasIdView<T>
    Mixin for views supporting selection of a item, in general related to a grid.
    InternalEntitiesView<T extends net.tangly.core.NamedEntity>
    The entity form provides an interface to all fields of an entity instance.
    One2ManyView<T>
    Defines a view for a list of referenced entities displayed in a grid.
    One2OneField<T extends net.tangly.core.HasName,V extends com.vaadin.flow.component.Component & HasIdView<T>>
    A composite field to display an one two one relationship instance.

    TagsView
